DOC.brief_title: Vitamin D Prostate Cancer : A Clinical Study Enrolling Subjects Undergoing Prostatectomy
DOC.detailed_description: This study enroll 80 ( 40 per study arm ) subject ( > 18 year age ) , recently diagnose prostate cancer ( histologically document adenocarcinoma prostate ) , schedule undergo prostatectomy . Eligible subject recruit Urology Clinic MUSC Ralph H. Johnson VAMC . All subject refer study Urologist . At baseline visit , consent obtain study procedure initiate . A blood sample obtain 25 ( OH ) D3 analysis . Subjects randomize either intervention group ( vitamin D3 4000 IU daily ) placebo group take study medication approximately two month schedule prostatectomy . The final study visit day surgery . A blood sample 25 ( OH ) D3 analysis obtain . Prostate tissue collect Pathologist ( ) genomics ( RNA sequence ) analysis ; ( b ) proteomics ( protein , glycons lipid ) analysis ( c ) Vitamin D Receptor ( VDR ) immunohistochemistry .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis prostate cancer ( prostate biopsy ) Scheduled undergo prostatectomy Ability give consent participate study Serum 25 ( OH ) D level le 8ng/ml great 50 ng/ml Vitamin D3 supplementation great equal 1000 IU daily
